Weeks

Readings must be completed by the first day of class. The readings for the first week are optional, but you may wish to read through them in preparation for your first essay.

  • Week 1 (9/7/2016)
    • Notes
    • Reading–please purchase the book by next week.
    • Allegory of the Cave
    • Essay 1 by Monday 9/12/2016 @ 12:00pm. You will find this in the folder for Week 1 in Blackboard. Submit the essay through Blackboard. Please use ‘attach file’ to upload the file. Do not use ‘write submission’ or send it as a message. See this screenshot
  • Week 2 (9/12/2016)
    • Notes
    • Answer key
    • Optional videos
    • Complete quiz 1 in Blackboard by Monday 9/19/2016 @ 12:00pm. You will find the quiz under week 1, topic 2.
      • Note that each quiz is timed. Once you click ‘start quiz’, you have 60 continuous minutes to complete it. If you navigate away from the page or close your browser, you cannot restart it.
      • Answers to the quiz will be released after the due date.
